summary: Races have equal skills, changes heights, and adds abilities/stats.
descriptionHtml:
ALL skill bonuses are removed. This allows for a more cosmetic purpose for race, and any race to become any class (i.e. High Elf warrior, Nord mage) and makes the game more challenging for beginners. 

Race heights have been slightly modified.

Argonian: 1.01
Breton: 0.95
Dark Elf: 1.08
High Elf: 1.1
Imperial: 1.0
Khajiit: 1.0
Nord: 1.05 (Draugr are this height too)
Orc: 1.065
Redguard: 1.0
Wood Elf: 1.08
author: IceTec1337
